name: Bouncy Butter Ball
description: Bouncy Butter Ball ! It's an ACT game where you can control a ball to break colored boxes, pass through dangerous thorn-blocks, moving gates, flipping traps, keys & locks.. 56 levels and 188 achievements will make you crazy !! Refreshing new record on leaderboard is VERY ADDICTIVE !!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or greater Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB video memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 512 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or greater Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB video memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 512 MB available space
